tosdr.case: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself

title: If you are the target of a copyright holder's take down notice, this service gives you the opportunity to defend yourself
quoteText: If you believe that Your Content that was removed (or to which access was disabled) is not infringing, or that you have the authorization from the copyright owner, the copyright ownerâ€™s agent, or pursuant to the law, to upload and use the content in Your Content, you may send a written counter-notice containing the following information to the Copyright Agent:
